values.name: Ourlean
values.desc: Technical Know-How: When you use a piece of Equipment or Consumable that features the Reactor trait, if you are not Proficient in that item, your base Success Range for it is a 4+.

values.name: Gex
values.desc: Camouflage 1AP: Until the start of your next turn, you do not count as a Valid Target for Spells and Attacks, and you cannot Threaten other creatures. Afterward, this action costs 1 more AP to use until the start of your next Expedition. This effect stacks.

values.name: Gex: Deinos
values.desc: Imposing Frame: Friendly creatures can treat you as Heavy Cover while within 1 Tile of you. While you are Threatening a creature, it suffers an additional -1 penalty to its Movement stat (after halving it).

values.name: Rodensha
values.desc: Scurry-Away: When you successfully hit a creature with a Critical Hit, the next Fall-Back Action you perform costs 1 AP until the end of your turn. This is reduced to 0 AP instead if you landed a Critical Hit during a Strike Action.

values.name: Rodensha: Packrat
values.desc: Pockets: When you remove a Consumable from your Inventory after using it, roll a D6. On a result of 5+, select another Consumable available to you with a Treasure Token cost of 2 or lower and add it into your Inventory in an empty slot. After successfully using this feature, you cannot use it again until you consume a Rest charge or start an Expedition; whichever comes first.

values.name: Hanoan
values.desc: Starlight Inheritance: Select one Spell from any Tier 1 Category. You gain access to that spell, and can cast it once while ignoring its Radioactive Control Cost. You regain the ability to cast this spell this way when you consume a Rest Charge.

enums.label: Star Sign
enums.description: Major constellation present during character's birth. No current mechanical implications.

values.name: The Traveler
values.desc: Born under the sign of The Traveler. You may find yourself always in motion. Perhaps this entails small twitches and motions, or maybe you find yourself living the nomadic lifestyle, unable to settle down and consider a place home.

values.name: The Fury
values.desc: Born under the sign of the now-removed Fury. You may find yourself prone to fits of aggression, which, if left unchecked, can result in far worse. Others may fear or revile you, for The Fury is the cause of many tragedies.

values.name: The Jollity
values.desc: Born under the sign of The Jollity. You may find that bad days are rare for you, but that is rarely ever due to a lack of misfortune. You could be almost unnaturally happy in your daily life or could even go so far as to lose the ability to feel negative emotions such as 'fear' or 'sadness'. Before The Jollity, all of life is a party, and we will all be dragged into the mirth.

values.name: The Keeper
values.desc: Born under the sign of The Keeper. You may find youself remembering moments both large and insignificant throuhgout your life experiences. Visions and echoes of the past may wander through your mind, whether you like it or not.

values.name: The Excess
values.desc: Born under the sign of The Excess. You may find that your hair and nails grow at a much faster rate than others. Perhaps you are uncharacterisically tall. As a more extreme case, you may have been afflicted with duplicates of organs and extremeties.

values.name: The Withering
values.desc: Born under the sign of The Withering. You may find yourself shedding dead skin or losing hair or fur at an alarming rate. In more extreme cases, you may appear much older than your biological age, in reference to both your looks and biological functions.

values.name: The Mirage
values.desc: Born under the sign of The Mirage. You may find yourself hearing and seeing things that are not actually there. Truth and lies may mesh together, and it will become a daily battle for you to discern the difference.

values.name: The Silence
values.desc: Born under the sign of The Silence. You may find yourself dulled to the world around you. Instants and years may pass before you realize. Yours can be a world without color, music, and relationships. It is no matter, even when all turns to dust, The Silence always remains.

values.name: The Fall
values.desc: Born under the sign of The Fall. You may find yourself becoming ill far more often and far worse than those around you. No sane person wishes to live beneath The Fall; though unfeeling, one cannot help but attribute its existence to cosmic malice. Attempts to remove this Constellation have always rendered Void Arks into Void Caskets.

values.name: Dead Stars
values.desc: Perhaps your birth would have seen the Stars if Void Arks hadn't torn so many from the skies. What was left on your birth was the corpse of a constellation, echoing forgotten purpose through the cosmos.

values.name: Starless Skies
values.desc: You were born in a place from removed from the light of the skies; so far away that their light could not possibly reach you. Perhaps you feel a little hollow knowing that others hold a part of the skies within them, or perhaps you're grateful that you haven't been tainted like the rest of the masses.

values.name: Soldier
values.desc: Command your allies to victory and control Objectives with a combination of melee and ranged weapons.

values.name: Duelist
values.desc: Utilize dynamic special moves to remove single targets from combat. Wide array of equipment.

values.name: Warrior
values.desc: Protect allies and keep enemies from approaching. Very durable, and has access to high DMG equipment.

values.name: Medicant
values.desc: Primary healing class. Provides plenty of Consumables and Conditions.

values.name: Engineer
values.desc: Objective-controlling class that can flexibly cast spells.

values.name: Artiste
values.desc: Spellcasting class that can provide unique bonuses to allies out of turn order.

values.name: Voidsman
values.desc: High burst damage spellcaster with access to a unique arsenal of Equipment.

values.name: Longsword
values.desc:
Classification: Sword. Handling: STR.

Damage: 2/3/2. Range: 1 

Traits: Melee, One-Handed, Murderstroke. 

Murderstroke (1AP): Until the end of your turn, reduce the BNS and CRT stats of this weapon to 0 and increase the DMG stat by the total amount reduced.

values.name: Great Blade
values.desc:
Classification: Greatsword. Handling: STR.

Damage: 6/3/2. Range: 1.

Traits: Melee, Two-Handed, Anti-Large 1.

Anti-Large 1: When you make an attack with this weapon against a creature that occupies more than one Tile at a time, you gain 1 additional attack die for that attack.

values.name: Steel-Shot Revolver
values.desc:
Classification: Pistol. Handling: DEX. 

Damage: 5/0/3. Range: 3-4.

Traits: Ranged, One-Handed, Firearm, Reload (6), Ammunition 6, Anti-Armor 1.

Reload 6(2AP): This weapon's current Ammunition count increases by 6. This is a 1 AP Action if there are no Hostile creatures within 2 Tiles of you.

values.name: Sabre
values.desc:
Classification: Rapier. Handling: DEX.

Damage: 2/2/4. Range: 1.

Traits: Melee, One-Handed, Flunge.

Flunge: When you perform the Hustle Action, treat this weapon's Range as 1-2 until the end of the next Strike or Multi-Strike Action you perform this turn.

values.name: Estoc
values.desc:
Classification: Rapier. Handling: PER.

Damage: 2/2/4. Range: 1-2.

Traits: Melee, Two-Handed, Pinpoint.

Pinpoint: This weapon's DMG stat is doubled during attacks made against creatures made at its Maximum Range.

values.name: Cloak
values.desc:
Classification: Cape. Handling: DEX.

Damage: 1/0/0. Range: 1.

Traits: Melee, One-Handed, Defensive Dueling (Cape), Concealing.

Defensive Dueling (Cape) (1RP): When you are targeted for an attack by a creature in your Line of Sight, roll a number of D6 equal to 2 + your AB. For each result of 5+, remove one successful die from the triggering attack. This Reaction counts as a Save.

values.name: Lead-Shot Revolver
values.desc:
Classification: Pistol. Handling: DEX.

Damage: 5/1/3. Range: 3-6.

Traits: Ranged, One-Handed, Firearm, Reload 6, Ammunition 6, Anti-Armor 1, Lead-Infused 1.

Reload 6 (2AP): This weapon's current Ammunition count increases by 6. This a 1 AP Action if there are no Hostile creatures within 2 Tiles of you.

Lead-Infused 1: When you land a Critical Hit with this weapon against a creature, it gains Jammed 1 until it regains Hit Points by any means, or until the end of Combat. Whichever comes first.

values.name: Great Bow
values.desc:
Classification: Bow. Handling: STR.

Damage: 4/6/2. Range: 5-8.

Traits: Ranged, Two-Handed, Anti-Large 1, Velocity.

Velocity: When making an Attack with this weapon, decrease its BNS by 1 for each Tile between you and the Target beyond this weapon's Minimum Range. This effect lasts only for the attack.

values.name: Greatsword
values.desc:
Classification: Greatsword Handling: STR.

Damage: 4/3/3. Range: 1.

Traits: Melee, Two-Handed, Threatening 1, Defensive Stance.

Defensive Stance (1AP): Until the start of your next turn, your AV is treated as being 1 greater when a creature within your Threat Range makes an attack against you.

values.name: Hatchet
values.desc:
Classification: Axe. Handling: DEX.

Damage: 1/2/3. Range: 1.

Traits: Melee, One-Handed, Twin-Threatening 1, Flurry 1.

Twin Threatening 1: While you are Dual-Wielding two of this weapon, your Threat is increased by 1.

Flurry 1: Once per attack with this weapon, if an attack die's result is within your Critical Range, you can deal Critical Damage to another creautre within this weapon's Range equal to this Weapon's CRT.

values.name: Buckler
values.desc:
Classification: Shield. Handling: STR.

Damage: 2/1/0. Range: 1.

Traits: Melee, One-Handed, Shield-Block 1.

Shield-Block 1 (1AP): Immediately gain 1 RP. Until the start of your next turn, if you are required to make a Save, your roll gains 1 additional bonus die.

values.name: Steel-Buck Shotgun
values.desc:
Classification; Shotugun. Handling: STR.

Damage: 10/2/0. Range: 1-3.

Traits: Ranged, Two-Handed, Blowback 2, Reload 1, Ammunition 1.

Reload 1 (1AP): This weapon's current Ammunition count becomes 1.

Blowback 2: If you would score a Critical Hit with this weapon, instead deal Critical Damage to the target equal to this weapon's DMG stat and push it 2 Tiles away from you in a straight line into an unoccupied Tile.

values.name: Battle Hammer
values.desc:
Classification: Warhammer. Handling: STR.

Damage: 7/2/3. Range: 1.

Traits: Melee, One-Handed, Threatening 1. Anti-Armor 1, Armor Crush,

Armor Crush: Critical Hits with this weapon reduce the target's AV by 1 until the end of combat. This effect does not stack.

values.name: Combat Knife
values.desc:
Classification: Knife. Handling: DEX.

Damage:2/2/3. Range: 1.

Traits: Melee, One-Handed, Bayonet.

Bayonet: You gain the following bonuses while Dual-Wielding this weapon with a Two-Handed firearm:

- Attacks made with this weapon are made with 1 additional attack die.

- The Range of this weapon is 1-2.

values.name: Trench Club
values.desc:
Classification: Club. Handling: STR.

Damage: 3/3/2. Range: 1.

Traits: Melee, One-Handed, Concussive.

Concussive: Critical Hits with this weapon inflict Thunderstruck and Suppressed on the target until the end of its next turn.

values.name: Reactor Carbine
values.desc:
Classification: Rifle. Handling: PER.

Damage: 5/0/4. Range: 4-7.

Traits: Ranged, Two-Handed, Firearm, Reactor, Ammunition 3, Catridge Reload 3.

Cartridge Reload 3 (2AP): If this weapon's current Ammunition count is 0, then this Action costs 1 less AP to use.

values.name: Reactor Pistol
values.desc:
Classification: Pistol. Handling: DEX.

Damage: 3/0/3. Range: 2-4.

Traits: Ranged, One-Handed, Firearm, Reactor, Ammunition 4, Reload 4.

Reload 4 (1AP): Increase this weapon's current Ammunition by 4.

values.name: First-Aid Bag
values.desc:
Classification: Hammer. Handling: STR.

Damage: Special. Range: 1-2.

Traits: Melee, One-Handed, First Aid 5, Heavy.

First Aid 5: While this weapon is in your Inventory, your Medical Supply Point Maximum is increased by 5.

Heavy: This weapon's DMG stat is equal to the numbers of occupied Consumable slots you possess. This weapon's BNS and CRT stats are equal to half the number of occupied Consumable Slots you possess.

values.name: Scalpel
values.desc:
Classification: Knife. Handling: PER.

Damage: 2/0/2. Range: 0-1.

Traits: Melee, One-Handed, Concealed, Serrated.

Concealed: Other creatures cannot react to attacks and other Actions performed with this weapon.

Serrated: Critical Hits with this weapon inflict Hemorrhaging on the target until after it regains Hit Points.

values.name: Derringer
values.desc:
Classification: Pistol. Handling: DEX.

Damage: 2/0/1. Range: 1-2.

Traits: Ranged, One-Handed, Firearm, Reload 4, Ammunition 4, Concealed.

Reload 4 (1AP): This weapon's current Ammunition count becomes 4.

Concealed: Other creatures cannot react to attacks and other Actions performed with this weapon.

values.name: Pipe Wrench
values.desc:
Classification: Hammer. Handling: STR.

Damage: 5/1/1. Range: 1

Traits: Melee, Two-Handed, Concussive, Tool.

Concussive: Critical Hits with this weapon inflict Thunderstruck and Suppressed on the target until the end of its next turn.

Tool: Whlie this wepaon is in your Inventory, you gain a +1 situational bonus to rolls made to repair or disassemble mechanical objects.

values.name: Rubber Mallet
values.desc:
Classification: Hammer. Handling: STR.

Damage: 3/1/1. Range: 1.

Traits: Melee, One-Handed, Non-Metallic.

Non-Metallic: This weapon cannot be targeted or be used to fulfill requirements for Magnetic spells and effects.

values.name: Duelist's Coat
values.desc:
Classification: Armor 

Armor Value: 3. Damage Reduction: 1.

values.name: Warrior's Steel Armor
values.desc:
Classification: Armor 

Armor Value: 3 Hit Point Maximum: +6. 

Traits: Steel.

values.name: Soldier's Fatigues
values.desc:
Classification: Armor 

Armor Value: 2 Movement Bonus: +1.

values.name: Medicant's Satchels
values.desc:
Classificaiton: Armor 

Armor Value: 2 

Medical Supplements: When you cause a creature to regain Hit Points, it regains additional Hit Points equal to your Medicant level.

values.name: Personal Reactor (General)
values.desc:
Classification: Armor 

Armor Value: 2 Radioactive Control Maximum: +3.

Easy Fission: You always have access to the Fissile Missile Spell. You are Proficient in this Spell, and if you would gain access to the Spell again from any source, treat your Skill Level with it as Professional.

values.name: Engineer's Lead-Liner Suit
values.desc:
Classification: Armor 

Armor Value: 3 

Protection from Radiation 1: When you are subjected to a Save from a source of Radiation (such as Spells, Cosmic Radiation, etc.) You can treat 1 die of that Save as a success without having to roll it.

values.name: Medicinal Salve
values.desc:
Classification: Consumable. Handling: INT.

Range: 0-1. Action Point Cost: 1-2.

Effect: Make an attack with this Consumable against a creature within Range. For each Success in that roll, the target regains Hit Points equal to your Intelligence Attribute. It regains double the amount instead for every Critical Success in the attack roll. You are considered Proficient with this Consumable, and are considered Professional if you spent 2AP to use this.

values.name: Magnifying Glass
values.desc:
Classification: Consumable. Handling PER.

Range: 0-1.

Effect: Treat your Success Range as being one greater when using this Consumable for rolls that involve identifying minute details about an Object or Environment within range. Note for self: Move to Equipment.

values.name: Adrenaline Shot
values.desc:
Classification: Consumable. Handling: INT.

Range: 0-1. Action Point Cost: 1.

Effect: Target creature ignores the Injured and Exhausted states until the end of its next turn.

values.name: Blood Bag
values.desc:
Classification: Consumable. Handling: INT.

Range: 1. Action Point Cost: 1-2.

Effect: Make an Intelligence Skill Roll against the Death Save DC of target creature. On a success, that creature's Death Save DC does not increase until the end of their next turn. You are considered Proficient in this Consumable and are considered Professional if you spent 2 AP to use this.

values.name: Coil of Rope
values.desc:
Classification: Consumable. Handling: DEX.

Range: 1. Action Point Cost: 1.

Effect: You gain a +1 situational bonus on Skill Rolls to bind two or more objects together. If used on a creature, that creature is only a Valid Target if it occupies no more than 4 Tiles. When using this Consumable on a creautre, make an Attack with it. If that attack would be successful, the Target becomes Suppressed. While a creature is Suppressed this way, it must roll a D6 at the start of each of its turns. On a result of 5+, it is no longer Suppressed and this Conusmable is immediately destroyed.

values.name: Rations
values.desc:
Classification: Consumable. Handling: CON.

Range: 0. Action Point Cost: 0.

Effect: At the end of a Combat in which you won, you may use this Consumable to recover Hit Points equal to your Character Level.

values.name: Company Banner
values.desc:
Classification: Consumable. Handling: STR.

Range: 0-1. Action Point Cost: 1-2.

Effect: Place a Banner Token in a Tile within Range. It becomes an Objective with a Control Range of 0-1 Tiles. It does not count towards victory conditions. 

While the Banner is placed, it provides Friendly creatures within its Line of Sight the Metabolism 2 condition until the exit Line of Sight. If you spent 2 Action Points to use this Consumable, Friendly creatures within this Token's Line of Sight immediately regain Hit Points equal to your Soldier Level.

If a Hostile creature controls this Objective, it is immediately destroyed. If Combat ends and this item is not destroyed, it is not consumed and is returned to your Inventory.

values.name: Steel Mill Worker
values.desc:
You gain a +1 situational bonus on Skill Rolls made to identify and make observations about Steel products.

You gain access to the Steelworker's Coveralls Equipment.

values.name: Reactor Operator
values.desc:
You gain a +1 situational bonus on Skill Rolls made to identify and understand the properties and workings of Nuclear Reactors. 

When you are targeted for the effects of a Spell, you can reroll one of your Save dice. You can only do this once per Round in Combat.

values.name: Void Navigator
values.desc:
When making rolls to use a vehicle, you can treat a number of dice equal to 1 + your Ability Bonus to be successful without rolling them. You must be in control of the vehicle to gain this bonus.

You also increase your Skill Level with one Classification of weapon of your choice that possesses the Firearm trait by 1 stage (to a maximum of Proficient).

values.name: Artisan
values.desc:
When you consume Treasure Tokens for items or a Service, roll a D6. On a result of 5+, you gain 1 Treasure Token. You cannot use this effect when purchasing things that cost 1 Treasure Token.

You can also reroll 1 die whenever making a Skill Roll to discern the quality or authenticity of an object.

values.name: Sewer Dweller
values.desc:
When making rolls to navigate or recall information about urban passageways such as sewers or alleyways, you can treat a number of dice equal to 1 + your Ability Bonus as being successful without rolling them.

You also gain access to the Glass Bottle equipment.

values.name: Ore Miner
values.desc:
You gain a +1 situational bonus on Skill Rolls made regarding mining activities, materials, and equipment.

While you are Underground, you gain a +1 Damage Reduction bonus.

values.name: Astrologist
values.desc:
You gain a +1 Situational bonuss on Skill Rolls made to recall information about Constellations.

When you are casting a spell that has the Perception Handling type, you can reroll one of your dice involved in that spell.

values.name: Jungle Dweller
values.desc:
When making rolls to navigate or recall information about natural Jungle environments such as rainforests or swamps, you can treat a number of dice equal to 1 + your Ability Bonus as successful without rolling them.

You gain access to the Blowpipe Equipment.
